headline: Allstate Announces Andréa Carter as Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., March 11, 2025--The Allstate Corp. (NYSE: ALL) today announced Andréa Carter will join the company as Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer, effective May 12. She will lead Allstate’s strategy to attract, develop and retain a high-performing and connected global workforce.
